tool_description: The epguides REST API allows developers to access and integrate information about TV episodes for many TV shows. Some example API methods include retrieving all of the episodes of a TV show, retrieving the last episode of a TV show, and retrieving the first episode of a TV show. epguides was built and is provided by Fredrik Carlsen.
name: epguides-api
title: epguides-api

api_list.name: List shows
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://frecar-epguides-api-v1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "frecar-epguides-api-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Next episode
api_list.description: Example: Next episode of Big Bang Theory
api_list.code:

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "frecar-epguides-api-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Episode released
api_list.description: Example: Check if specific episode released
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://frecar-epguides-api-v1.p.rapidapi.com/bigbangtheory/9/1/released/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "frecar-epguides-api-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
